content: finished measurements at chest 34 5/8 -37 ¾ -41 full length 24 -26 ¾ -29½ materials drops silke-alpaca from garnstudio 350-400-500 g color no 6208 light gray-blue drops crochet hook size 6 mm / j/10 or the crochet hook size needed to obtain correct crochet gauge crochet gauge 3 rounds of the crochet square measures 6 5 cm / 2½ and 11 treble_crochet x 3 rounds of texture pattern = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
